divs: Sighting Detailsi see these triangles rotating alot in the skys here in fresno. somtimes there blinking somtimes they dont. i see helicopters and planes i believe there ufos pretending to be planes. i have very good reason to believe it sense i consider myself a expert. because the simple fact a ufo followed me home aug 2nd 2006 ever sense these objects hace bee comming around. i have filmed over 300 hours of very good footage that i really believe are real ufos. i have aliens on film as well. the aliens have been in the house in my room. i cant go into detail here but i assure you thise needs further investigation. i have very good reason to know that even the so called reptilians have come here i have seen them. i donty bull crap around and waist peoples time. i can show or tell you anything you want to know about thewse ufo aliens. some aliens appear to be friends other im not so sure. i have studied this ufo alien subject 30 years so i know. the aliens tap on my walls they ran acroos my roof one night. i have things i can tell that seem ridiculas but i assure you there not! please contact me asap
